source: Dayton Audio UMII18-22 spec sheet (PDF) - exact values used in WinISD

thiele_small.blNote: PDF spec: 19.2. WinISD shows 38.4 (possibly dual VC convention). Using PDF value.

notes: UMII18-22 is Ultimax II series with 28mm Xmax (Klippel verified at 70% BL)
All specs measured with dual 2-ohm voice coils wired in series
Pe is RMS power handling per AES 426B standard
Xmax is peak one-way linear excursion
